name: Splendid
description:
Theme "one action at a time"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

goal - throw the dice and move all the red pieces from the bottom right to the top left before blue team.

on collision piece will get respawned in the original team location.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls - mouse

left click to select dice/piece

hold right click to rotate the camera

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

music - unity asset store.

time - 25 minutes, full of bugs as a result :D

this game is just a prototype ;)
